test.name: Order robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc

kw.name: Get Secret
kw.doc: Read a secret from the configured source, e.g. Robocorp Vault, and return it as a ``Secret`` object.
kw.msg: Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://robotsparebinindustries.com/#/robot-order

kw.name: Get Value From User
kw.arg: What is the URL of the orders CSV file?
kw.doc: Pauses test execution and asks user to input a value.

kw.name: Download
kw.doc: An alias for the ``HTTP Get`` keyword.
